title: Wilfred Kaplan
summary: Wilfred Kaplan (November 28, 1915 â€“ December 26, 2007) was a professor of mathematics at the University of Michigan for 46 years, from 1940 through 1986. His research focused on dynamical systems, the topology of curve families, complex function theory, and differential equations. In total, he authored over 30 research papers and 11 textbooks.
